AD_Arrival_Harper_001.synopsis: Single-shot AD when the Harpers arrive back into Haven from the ambush in the shadow-curse where one of their own, Yonas, is killed by shadow creatures. Relieved but sad.

AD_Arrival_Harper_000.synopsis: Single-fire AD when LAssandra lands back at Haven after the scene where her contingent is attacked by shadow creatures. She is relieved to be back but heavy-hearted cause one of her own was lost.

Harper_003.synopsis: Harper Scout's default dialogue through several states in Haven.
Harper_003.how_to_trigger: 1. DebugBook > Goto Region: Act 2 > ShadowCurseLands > Mountain Pass Entry. 2. Goto 57.566; 42.958; 134.4213. Agree to help fight the shadow creatures4. reCon killCombat5. Agree to follow them to Haven6. At CheckPoint Cinematic, press choice 1 all the way.7. Follow Harper Karrow all the way to a small makeshift altar8. Talk to her to trigger dialogue

Harper_000.synopsis: Dialogue in Haven for one of the harper scouts you helped in SCL (SCL_HarperScouts_ShadowCreatures). She is mourning Yonas' death and gives some information about the shadow curse.
Harper_000.how_to_trigger: 1. DebugBook > Goto Region: Act 2 > ShadowCurseLands > Mountain Pass Entry. 2. Goto 57.566; 42.958; 134.4213. Agree to help fight the shadow creatures4. reCon killCombat5. Agree to follow them to Haven6. At CheckPoint Cinematic, press choice 1 all the way.7. Follow Lassandra all the way to a small makeshift altar8. Talk to her to trigger dialogue

Harper_001.synopsis: Dialogue with Meygan in Last Light. She is standing before an altar, mourning Yonas' death. She might give us something if we give her his sword. Despite changes in the state of the grove, she usually reverts to her normal dialogue/ state of sadness as she was close to Yonas and that's more to the front of her mind than stuff like Ketheric

AD_Arrival_Harper_003.synopsis: One-shot Harper AD after arriving back in Haven post the attack on the Harper contingent that leaves Yonas dead. Sad but relieved.

AD_Arrival_Harper_000_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
AD_Arrival_Harper_000_0.text: Yonas should be here with us.
AD_Arrival_Harper_000_0.context: NodeContext: Yonas died recently on a mission

Harper_003_0.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_0.text: We lost a good one today. Yonas. He was green as they come, poor kid.
Harper_003_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Reflecting on a dead soldier

Harper_003_2.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_2.text: Gods above, what a forsaken place.
Harper_003_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

Harper_003_3.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_3.text: This might be the only peaceful spot for a league.
Harper_003_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

Harper_003_5.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_5.text: I thought we were safe here. More fool me.
Harper_003_5.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

Harper_003_6.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_6.text: You've proven yourself a powerful ally. It's an honour to fight beside you.

Harper_003_7.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_7.text: Thanks to you we've got a chance to fight back. We'll make it count.

Harper_003_8.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_8.text: Poor Yonas. Kid was as green as they come.
Harper_003_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Reflecting on a dead soldier

Harper_003_9.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_9.text: Keep your eyes sharp. Anyone could be a traitor.
Harper_003_9.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

Harper_003_10.speaker: Harper Karrow
Harper_003_10.text: We survived one attack. Not sure we'd survive a second.
Harper_003_10.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

Harper_000_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_0.text: Thank you for helping us out there. Those shadows would've torn us to bits.
Harper_000_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

Harper_000_1.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_1.text: Cosy spot, all in all - let's hope it stays that way.

Harper_000_2.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_2.text: We lost too many good people out here.

Harper_000_3.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_3.text: Watch our backs - and we'll watch yours.
Harper_000_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

Harper_000_4.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_4.text: Hope you're faring all right. Yonas might be gone, but the rest of us can't give up yet.
Harper_000_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

Harper_000_5.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_5.text: If the first wave can't hold the dark, it'll be up to us - you, me, and the rest.

Harper_000_6.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_6.text: Looks like we're not as safe here as we thought. Foolish of me to think the curse would stay outside.
Harper_000_6.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

Harper_000_10.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_10.text: You made it through the dark? Lucky you - not everyone does.

Harper_000_9.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_9.text: He was a good Harper. A good friend.

Harper_000_11.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_11.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

Harper_000_12.speaker: Harper Lassandra
Harper_000_12.text: This place might've lost Isobel, but it hasn't lost us.
Harper_000_12.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

Harper_001_2.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_2.text: Path to Moonrise is opening up. Time for vengeance.
Harper_001_2.context: NodeContext: bitter, preparing for battle but it's become personal

Harper_001_7.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_7.text: We need to end this quickly - before the shadows break through again.

Harper_001_10.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Has been crying - wipes away tearInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet.NodeContext: Sad, like she's been crying

Harper_001_18.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_18.text: He was joking, this morning. Yonas, I mean.
Harper_001_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player walks up to stand behind Meygan, but she doesn't look at them.InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet.

Harper_001_24.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_24.text: There was an ambush in the dark. The shadows dragged him away...

Harper_001_36.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_36.text: He was always joking. Said it was good for morale, but he just liked seeing people laugh.
Harper_001_36.context: NodeContext: Small pause before the line.

Harper_001_13.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_13.text: He was a good Harper. A good friend...
Harper_001_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns to face player after finishing this line

Harper_001_60.speaker: Player
Harper_001_60.text: I found his sword on his body. Would you like to have it?

Harper_001_47.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_47.text: I... yes, I'd like that. I don't know what to say.

Harper_001_5.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_5.text: He always took such good care of this... I'll do the same. For him.

Harper_001_34.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_34.context: NodeContext: Meygan stares into space for a few beats, fighting back tears. She steels herself and turns to face the player

Harper_001_44.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_44.text: I should thank you... take this.
Harper_001_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Meygan takes object from inventory behind back and hands it to player.InternalNodeContext: Needs reward

Harper_001_17.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_17.text: I think I need some time by myself now.
Harper_001_17.context: NodeContext: After line she turns away from the player, as she brushes away tears.

Harper_001_8.speaker: Player
Harper_001_8.text: I don't care what you say, so long as you pay.

Harper_001_61.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_61.text: Thought you were doing me a kindness. Stupid of me.
Harper_001_61.context: NodeContext: Tone hardening against the player's sudden mercenary streak.

Harper_001_56.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_56.text: Here. Take it and leave me be.

Harper_001_39.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_39.text: Got nothing to give you for it. Just... leave me be.

Harper_001_19.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_19.text: What is wrong with you? Just... leave me be.

Harper_001_51.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_51.text: I thought we could have been something more, one day, but...
Harper_001_51.context: NodeContext: Chokes up a little. Swallows back her tears.

Harper_001_9.speaker: Player
Harper_001_9.text: I'm sure he knew. I'm sure he cared for you as well.

Harper_001_48.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_48.text: I don't know. And I never will.

Harper_001_29.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_29.text: I'm sorry, I'd like to be alone.

Harper_001_35.speaker: Player
Harper_001_35.text: Hey - it will be all right.

Harper_001_20.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_20.text: No, he... Sorry, I - I'd like to be alone.

Harper_001_59.speaker: Player
Harper_001_59.text: It doesn't have to be too late.

Harper_001_0.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_0.text: What are you talking- gods, no!

Harper_001_11.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_11.text: I - I'd like to be alone.
Harper_001_11.context: NodeContext: Cold response to "you'll get over it"

Harper_001_66.speaker: Player
Harper_001_66.text: I'm sure he'd appreciate your prayers.

Harper_001_23.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_23.text: I hope so. They're all I have to give.

Harper_001_21.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_21.text: Thank you. You're a good person.

Harper_001_31.speaker: Player
Harper_001_31.text: Don't lose yourself in grief - many more will fall in battles to come.

Harper_001_6.speaker: Player
Harper_001_6.text: If you lose yourself to grief we will fall before the true battle begins. Harden your heart.

Harper_001_3.speaker: Player
Harper_001_3.text: There is no better death than to fall in battle. You should be happy for him!

Harper_001_40.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_40.text: Why would that make me happy? Sorry, I - I'd like to be alone.
Harper_001_40.context: NodeContext: horrified, Chokes up a little. Swallows back her tears.

Harper_001_38.speaker: Player
Harper_001_38.text: I'm so sorry for your loss.

Harper_001_63.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_63.text: Sorry, I - I don't think I can talk right now.

Harper_001_12.speaker: Player
Harper_001_12.text: It's a dangerous life, being a soldier.

Harper_001_41.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_41.text: All the more reason to mourn the ones we lose.

Harper_001_25.speaker: Player
Harper_001_25.text: Better at jokes than keeping himself alive, I hope.

Harper_001_4.speaker: Player
Harper_001_4.text: Dead, is he? Maybe if he'd spent less time joking, he'd still be around.

Harper_001_53.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_53.context: NodeContext: She purses her lips, fighting back despair, anger and tears. She can barely speak.

Harper_001_54.speaker: Player
Harper_001_54.text: Smart. Bit of levity before a daunting battle never hurt.

Harper_001_62.speaker: Player
Harper_001_62.text: Humour helps on a hunt - it can be the spark when all hope is lost.

Harper_001_22.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_22.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.NodeContext: With grit

Harper_001_27.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_27.context: NodeContext: bitter, preparing for battle but it's become personal

Harper_001_30.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_30.text: You must know better than any of us - we've got to get into the Towers. Now.

Harper_001_33.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_33.text: They're here. More of those things that killed Yonas. I won't let them take anyone else.
Harper_001_33.context: InternalNodeContext: Isobel is gone and Shadow Creatures are sieging the Haven. Some NPCs are in the basement.

Harper_001_45.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_45.text: I'd rather die myself than see another Harper taken.
Harper_001_45.context: InternalNodeContext: Isobel is gone and Shadow Creatures are sieging the Haven. Some NPCs are in the basement.

Harper_001_65.speaker: Harper Meygan
Harper_001_65.text: I don't care what it takes; this place will not fall.
Harper_001_65.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.NodeContext: full of grit

AD_Arrival_Harper_003_0.speaker: Harper Karrow
AD_Arrival_Harper_003_0.text: Wasn't sure we'd see light again.
